title: 58: OBITCH the promise of forever...
description:
Beep Beep! Get in line Geoffs because this week we’re learning the fascinating history of funeral processions! Madison then comes in to teach us the roots of cemetery burials! We’ve got an obituary with some sage advice, a scathing one that’s been making the rounds for a real bad dad, and of course we’ve got some dumb.ass.criminallllls! 




New episodes come out every (day of week) for free, with 1-week early access for Wondery+ subscribers.


SEE US LIVE IN IRVINE ON AUGUST 4TH: https://tinyurl.com/3fvwbsnz



Follow along online: @obitchuarypod on Twitter & Instagram. 


Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com


Spencer Henry & Madison Reyes

PO Box 18149 Long Beach, CA 90807


Get a cameo from us: https://www.cameo.com/obitchuarypodcast



Sources:


https://www.heritagedaily.com/2017/04/can-houses-die-iron-age-to-viking-longhouses-were-burned-and-buried/114636

https://www.joincake.com/blog/why-do-we-bury-the-dead/

https://www.thoughtco.com/death-and-burial-customs-1421757

https://greekreporter.com/2022/05/07/ancient-cemetery-for-infants-discovered-on-greek-island/

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Père_Lachaise_Cemetery

https://www.pps.org/article/how-six-cemeteries-are-reclaiming-their-role-as-public-spaces

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rural_Cemetery_Act

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adolph_Strauch

https://arnosvale.org.uk/all-events/

https://www.theatlantic.com/national/archive/2011/03/our-first-public-parks-the-forgotten-history-of-cemeteries/71818/

https://www.theatlantic.com/national/archive/2011/03/our-first-public-parks-the-forgotten-history-of-cemeteries/71818/

https://www.foxla.com/news/chickens-die-every-day-people-florida-man-arrested-for-killing-neighbors-rooster-claims-self-defense?utm_campaign=trueanthem&utm_medium=trueanthem&utm_source=facebook&fbclid=IwAR24rnzEs9quErdbH9NtjP3UXFiTQwYIX8bDAdhBlVZ7l4AFi7_g-Q1IF1k

https://www.iflscience.com/gay-polyamorous-goose-and-new-zealand-legend-dies-at-40-46054?fbclid=IwAR1IwcfvjKLQdmyzsfiI2Q0lRMqJKqtL4oZgCYw8aD0Y6JeQnQwf1_N1CVc

https://patch.com/connecticut/easthaven/exhumation-cold-case-murder-now-she-remains-buried-unknown

https://keohane.com/featured-faq/faq-traditions-etiquette-funeral-procession/

https://people.howstuffworks.com/culture-traditions/funerals/do-have-to-pull-over-for-funeral-procession.htm

https://www.jewelrykeepsakes.com/funeral-processions

https://face2faceafrica.com/article/the-powerful-story-behind-the-jazz-funerals-of-new-orleans

https://www.funeralwise.com/funeral-customs/neworleans-jazz/

https://beyondthedash.com/blog/cultural-spotlight/jazz-funerals-a-new-orleans-goodbye/7363

https://www.1011now.com/content/news/Nebraska-man-admits-to-sending-prostitutes-to-neighbors-home-422090033.html
